messages.message:
On Converse,

Even if I choose a specific document, it gives me the answer from the entire knowledge base. Checked the request that was going through.
It has all ibdocs and relative paths. Not sure if the UI is making the right API call to isolate the prompt to one file.

Chatbot link: https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/5cdf72ae-cb92-4687-add5-5577e4f1015d


    a. `{"model_name":"ibllm","model_version":"2.1.0","model_payload":{"custom_request":{"local_timestamp":"April 17 at 11:45 AM","task":"multi_doc","project_id":"5cdf72ae-cb92-4687-add5-5577e4f1015d","user_prompt":"unattended-machinery-fire-safety-guide.pdf @ What's the procedure to put out an LPG Are you making a query from Chatbot UI? If so, there are no provisions to select a file for querying. The scope of query in chatbot is all files.
